title: How to Make a Bacon Flavored Dip Mix

steps.headline: Measure the ingredients and add them to a small bowl.
Blend everything thoroughly with a spoon.
Add the mixture to an airtight container.
Store the mixture until ready to use.
steps.description: You can allow it to stay in a dry, cool place up to six months.

steps.headline: Create the bacon dip.
steps.description:
In a medium bowl, add the bacon dip mix with one of the following:
1 cup (230g) cottage cheese
1 cup (245g) yogurt
1 cup (230g) sour cream
8 ounces (230g) cream cheese, softened

steps.headline: Chill in the refrigerator for about an hour before using.

text:
Measure the ingredients and add them to a small bowl.  Blend everything thoroughly with a spoon.  Add the mixture to an airtight container. Label the container. Store the mixture until ready to use. You can allow it to stay in a dry, cool place up to six months. Create the bacon dip. In a medium bowl, add the bacon dip mix with one of the following:
1 cup (230g) cottage cheese
1 cup (245g) yogurt
1 cup (230g) sour cream
8 ounces (230g) cream cheese, softened Chill in the refrigerator for about an hour before using.
